Actions.Name: Raze
Actions.Effects: All foes in range 2 take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Swing Shovel
Actions.Description: Roll 1d6. An adjacent character takes that much damage, and is shoved half that number of spaces.

Actions.Name: Fertilize
Actions.Description: The Deep Farmer chooses a space in range 2. At the end of their turn, this space grows into a mushroom object.

Summons.Name: Mushroom
Summons.Effects: Aura 1. Characters in the spore-filled aura other than the Deep Farmer choke and are winded.

Actions.Name: Pull Vegetable
Actions.Description: The Deep farmer pulls out a massive vegetable by the roots. Its next attack deals bonus damage and stuns on hit. Stunned foes are critically hit (+[D]).
